text: He mominaharu! Imana lya'eka baheka arula'i aphno ghanista mitra nabana'u. Timi ta dekhdainau, yi manisaharule timiharula'i barbada parnama kunai kasara bamki rakhdainan ra yiniharu cahanchan ki (jasari pani) timila'i kasta pugos. Tiniharuka mukhabata ta satruta prakata bha'isakeko cha ra juna (chalakapata) tinaka chatima lukeko cha, tyo ta jhan dherai cha. Hamile timila'i aphna ayataharu spasta garidi'isakeka chaum yadi timi bujhadachau
